==Desirability== The '''crown of Dyrovepreva'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|835}} is essentially a +2 [[helmet]] with rElec, a moderately rare and useful resistance. The other bonuses are nice to have, at the least. While you can find better [[randart]] hats out there, this artefact is stronger than any mundane headgear (unless you need [[willpower]]). ==History== *Prior to [[0.15]], the crown of Dyrovepreva increased its wearer's [[hunger|metabolism]]. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Headgear]]
